The simplest barcode maker available!

• Generate barcodes in various formats quickly from your browser.
• Supports popular formats, including QR Code and UPC.
• Optionally include the human readable text on the barcode.
• Supports downloading the barcode as a PNG image.
• Supports your OS's dark mode.
